snippet: The reason for moving the detainees, held since their ship was seized after an open-seas protest against oil drilling in the Arctic, to a St. Petersburg jail was not immediately clear.
abstract: Russia is preparing to transfer 30 crew members of a Greenpeace International ship from a detention center in far northern city of Murmansk to a jail in St Petersburg; reason for moving detainees, held since ship was seized after open-seas protest against oil drilling in the Arctic, is not immediately clear.
lead_paragraph: The reason for moving the detainees, held since their ship was seized after an open-seas protest against oil drilling in the Arctic, to a St. Petersburg jail was not immediately clear.

headline.main: Russia to Transfer Detained Greenpeace Activists
headline.print_headline:
Greenpeace Says Russia
Is to Transfer
Detainees
